fraud_pattern: Geo-Inconsistent Activity: Updates from multiple unusual locations within short timeframe
primary_reasons: ⚠️ HIGH RISK: Significant deviations from normal patterns
The total enrolment count is extremely higher than expected
The demographic update count is extremely higher than expected
The weekend activity is slightly lower than expected
The district activity level is slightly lower than expected (possible volume spike)
The state activity level is slightly higher than expected (possible volume spike)
Complex pattern deviates from learned normal behavior

deviations.explanation: Total Enrolments is extremely higher than expected (deviates from typical behavior)
Total Demo Updates is extremely higher than expected (deviates from typical behavior)
Is Weekend is extremely lower than expected (unusual for this time period)
District Event Count is moderately lower than expected (unusual for this location)
State Event Count is slightly higher than expected (unusual for this location)

isolation_forest.finding: Easily isolated from normal records (statistical outlier)

hdbscan.finding: Does not belong to any normal behavior cluster

total_demo_updates deviates from typical pattern for this month

recommendation: IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED: Geo-Inconsistent Activity: Updates from multiple unusual locations within short timeframe. Conduct thorough investigation and consider suspension pending review.
